author: Jay Pound
comment: Long time Android wear user and this may be my first review for a watch face. I have looked for a long time for a basic, digital watch face that resembles something like you would find one Fenix or Suunto. Finally, I found this. So far I love it. Only request I would make is a few more color options for the dial and time. But it is already 5 star material.
title: Finally, a Great Digital Watch Face

comment: Please add a seconds indicator,  maybe the red arrow at bottom.  Also the face does not work on more than one watch at the same time.
title: Seconds

author: Matthew Chartrand
comment: Great easy to read face, but I wish the headings under the time were functional instead of being purely aesthetic.
title: No interactive options

author: Ketzal Sterling
comment: Nice and easy to read digital watch face. You'd be surprised how hard it's been to find one for Android wear.
title: Near perfect

comment: By far my fav face but it lacks the compass feature. Also another widget  under time and alt/Baro would be cool. Style is identical to my suunto core
title: More features

author: Brandon Skaggs
comment: This is easily one of my favorite watch faces since it makes my Moto 360 look like a Suunto Core watch!  I love it and really like the phone battery percentage and the watch battery percentage indicators!
title: Great Watch Face

author: John Markert
comment: One problem with it: it keeps running on the phone. Even when other watch face is in use...
title: Basically OK.

author: Steven Francis
comment: Love it.  The best one yet....I agree with another review, it makes the watch look like a Suunto watch.  Keep up the good work.

author: allen lopez
comment: Looks great on my Zenwatch 2 .
title: Great watch face.

author: Mark O'Byrnes
comment: I like it a lot and works great with My LG Urbane.
title: Great watch face!

author: Dan Silvia
comment: This watch face is perfect. It has battery info for both the watch AND the phone. It looks fantastic (especially on a round watch like the LG G WatchR), and has some simple but great customizations! Also, it doesn't hurt that the developer listens to feedback! (Now if we could get the people a little darker... It comes out pinkish on my watch... :) ).  Highly recommend this watch face!

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content: hi, there is a new update that introduce a new "minimal dimmed mode" to prevent and extend battery life. Let me know if you like it and please consider to "update" your rating :) many thanks S.

title: New favorite watch face

author: Jason Riggs
comment: I've never once been able to use this face on my G Watch. As soon as I set it I get "unfortunately BK3CK Sporty has stopped." Even uninstalled the app and factory reset my watch. It's broken software, and I'm well beyond the refund period.

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content: hi, we're rolling out a new update that contain new features/Fix: - FIX face block at startup on some configuration - Same Font size in minimal dimmed mode - Enabled possibility to set a "blank space" as text logo If you like it, and it works, please consider to update your rating/messege bye BL3CK

title: Crashes on G Watch

author: Mathew M
comment: Can't set a blank "text logo" which is super ugly, also can't disable extraneous text.  Time resizes between battery saving and normal view mode which is very distracting

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content:
hi,
we're rolling out a new update that contain new features:
- Same Font size in minimal dimmed mode
- Enabled possibility to set a "blank space" as text logo
If you like it please consider to update your rating

bye
BL3CK

title: Poor settings options

author: Chris Lawson
comment: Can't use on g watch, crashes instantly. UPDATE reset my phone and haven't had any issues with it since the beginning.

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content: hi, we're so sorry about crashes; what's your config (Android build of Wear and Mobile)? we will verify and give you an update as soon as possible!

title: Awesome

author: HardDriver Mejia
comment: Crashes. I can't even use it on Moto 360

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content:
hi,
we're rolling out a new update that contain new features/Fix:
- FIX face block at startup on some configuration
- Same Font size in minimal dimmed mode
- Enabled possibility to set a "blank space" as text logo

If you like it, and it works, please consider to update your rating/messege

bye
BL3CK

author: Riccardo Rangoni Machiavelli
comment: One word..perfect!! good job!
Noticed it drains my battery alot...

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content:
hi, there is a new update that introduce a new "minimal dimmed mode" to prevent and extend battery life.
Let me know if you like it and please consider to "update" your rating :)
many thanks
S.

title: Drains

author: Esbjörn T
comment: Reinstalled and not crashing now. Using LG G R watch, looks fantastic in both modes.

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content: we are sorry about this issue, please could you provide us some info in order to check the issue? device used, Android version, android wear version.

title: My favourite watch face now

author: Michał Ulaski
comment: There is a difference beetwean digits on the nirmal and ambient screen, which makes the it look bad when it is switching one way or the other :(
title: Almost ideal but ...

author: Richard Cole
comment: Didn't show up on my Sony smartwatch 3. Resynced apps, restarted phone and watch, nothing.

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content:
We are sorry about this issue. Usually it depends by wrong comunication between phone and wear device.
Please provide us more info via email and we'll try to support you during the installation phase.

title: Didn't work.

author: Jordan Wallace
comment: Does not pick up phone battery... Otherwise great.

reply.author: BL3CK FACE
reply.content:
Hi, to sync the phone battery you have to open the companion app for few seconds.
Bye
